News.Title: Positron Energy Signs 5-Year LNG Regasification Agreement with HPCL
News.Summary: Positron Energy has executed a master agreement with Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited (HPCL) for LNG regasification services. The agreement has a tenure of 5 years, indicating a long-term commitment between the two companies in the LNG sector.

News.Title: Positron Energy Signs 5-Year Regasification Agreement with HPCL LNG
News.Summary: Positron Energy has executed a master agreement with HPCL LNG for regasification services. The agreement has a tenure of 5 years, indicating a long-term commitment between the two companies for liquefied natural gas (LNG) processing.
